concept-wr.title: UEFI Support
concept-wr.shortdesc: Titanium Server supports hosts that use UEFI.

conbody.p: US80802 new topicThe Unified Extensible Firmware Interface (UEFI) specification replaces the traditional hardware-specific BIOS with a standards-based extensible interface between the hardware platform and the operating system. This overcomes the design limitations of BIOS for greatly improved hardware support. Titanium Server supports PXE boot for hosts configured to use either BIOS or UEFI.
